actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend titles 18 and 39 of the United States Code, to exempt State-conducted lotteries from certain prohibitions of Federal law.

summary.text: Exempts State conducted lotteries, gift enterprises, or similar schemes from the criminal provisions of title 18 of the United States Code, and from the prohibition against delivery of lottery information by the United States Postal Service.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles 18 and 39 of the United States Code, to exempt State-conducted lotteries from certain prohibitions of Federal law.
